title: Deal Share
subtitle: Create and launch a viral deal on your Facebook Page where you can set the number of registrations required to unlock a group discount.
bells_whistles: Customizable deal settings (timelines, participants, price) allow for complete flexibility, and easy editing tools enable custom deal design and share settings. Best of all, no need for a new ecommerce solution, as Deal Share integrates seamlessly with your website's current platform or PayPal account.

features.title: Get More Fans
features.description: Our fan gate feature entices new viewers to like your Page before they can interact with your apps. This can explosively drive up your fan count, giving you a large audience to message, activate promotions, and push out must-have content to in the future.

features.title: Share Management
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page.

features.title: Easy Design
features.description: Our Content Management System makes creating, editing, and updating your Facebook app simple. Easy editing tools let you change directions quickly - not holding you to your web guys schedule.

features.title: Social CRM
features.description: North Contact is integrated into North Social to give you simple tools to manage and grow your subscriber lists, create and send beautiful emails, and track every click, open, delete, and forward.

features.title: Simple Sign Up
features.description: Embedded sign up form makes deal entry easy, and allows you to watch the group gain numbers in real-time.
